des:
Before you can connect Alexa with Action smart devices, you need to follow these steps:
1. Download "Action Smart" app from Google Play or App Store.
2. Sign up or sign in with your Action Smart account.
3. Setup the device with your "Action Smart" app, and make sure you can control it in the app.
4. Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app;
5. Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Action Smart";
6. Click Enable skill of "Action Smart", then input your account username, password and region on the linking page;
7. Talk to Echo "Alexa,discover devices" . Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
8. Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.
IMPORTANT: You can rename the devices with Alexa App or Action Smart App. So if you rename a smart switch “Livingroom Light”, then Echo will get that same name after discovered the devices in Step 8.

Plug:
Alexa, turn on the smart plug
Alexa, turn off the smart plug

Switch:
Alexa, turn on the switch
Alexa, turn off the switch

With this Skil you are able to control Action Smart Coffee maker (Custom Intent):
Alexa,ask action smart to cook coffee
Alexa,tell action smart to light coffee
Alexa,open action smart and two cups of light coffee
Alexa,tell action smart stop coffee maker

Further tips:
1.Mode selection: Cook/Make/Brew
2.Strength selection: light/medium/Strong
3. Select cups: 2/4/6/8/10/12. 
FAQ:
When Alexa remind you:“sorry,water level deficiency!”
1.Please check if there is enough water in the coffee maker water tank . 
2.Whether the coffee maker glass carafe is not in place or the door is not closed.
3.Device control failed.
4.Operation timed out.
5.The service is temporarily unavailable.
